extendedInfo.description: The AutoTrader.com app is your solution for finding the right car or dealer, no matter where you are. Save cars and searches to your personal âMy AutoTraderâ account, and retrieve them later from any mobile device or computer. The ultimate automotive marketplace is now in your hands. You can: â Search for new, used and certified cars near you.â Contact a seller by phone or email directly from a vehicle listing. â Map local dealerships, and view their services and amenities. â Use Keyword Search to find vehicles and specific dealer services and amenities near you. â Scan the VIN barcode of a car you like to search for similar cars near you, or save it for later. (Autofocus feature required.)â Create a free âMy AutoTraderâ account to save your favorite cars and searches. â Access your saved cars and searches from any other mobile device or computer. â Revisit recent searches and vehicles you've viewed right from the Find Cars section.â Share cars with friends and family on FacebookPlease share your comments with us via the "Feedback" button, which youâll find in the Settings section. Please note this app is not optimized for Android tablet devices.

reviews.title: Lg motion
reviews.comment: Love this app soo helpful
reviews.author: Jessica Potter

reviews.title: Freezes.. .
reviews.comment: At first the app worked fine...but after a while it started freezing and closing regularly. If you go to another app, when you open it back up you will have to start your search over...It is better on the actual site.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps closing.
reviews.comment: This app closes every time i use it and wont let me back on.
reviews.author: Caleb Rabalais

reviews.title: Cool car finding app
reviews.comment: I use it everyday to look for cheap cars in my area love it so far but could be better
reviews.author: ZACHARY FELTON

reviews.title: OK...but needs work
reviews.comment: Need to limit the number of vehicles shown otherwise it bogs down.  Also, don\'t let it search for zip code by default.  It either doesn\'t work or takes waaaay to long.  Even if I manually enter the zip, the app will still return an unvalidated zip but still works...though it kicks me back a step.
reviews.author: Michael Miller

reviews.title: No vehicle location
reviews.comment: Wont let me save more than 3 cars, also takes 5 minutes to ask a simple question because of so many pointless required fields...
reviews.author: Jason Withrow

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: All I get is a blank screen when I search... android RAZR
reviews.author: Gary Martin

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is a great app for finding cars the only thing I don\'t like is when you are looking for a certain model of car. They don\'t have it listed, like Saturn ion redline model u have too use key word. Function  or Subaru sti...other than that I recommend using it...very helpful!
reviews.author: Jp Duncan

reviews.title: Great Bargaining Tool
reviews.comment: If you walk onto a car lot without this installed on your phone your crazy. It\'s great watching the salesman swim Squirm when you pull up the same car he\'s trying to sell you on other in the area lots for 3-5k less.
reviews.author: Shannon Gilliam

reviews.title: This app sucks!!!
reviews.comment: Every time I\'m looking for a model of specific car brand (for example toyota tundra) if i wanna keep looking for another toyota model and if I press the back bottom it will take me all the way back to beginning of  searching process where I have to select Toyota again then the model I\'m looking for ...plz fix.
reviews.author: Ismael Diaz

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: It is a great idea but the biggest problem is that the app does not work. You get a screen that you can make selections from but that\'s it select anything on it and you get NOTHING..............
reviews.author: Craig O\'Brien

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app but lacks the ability to search for 3 different make and models like in the desktop version. Also can\'t save pictures to my phone or email or text them. 5 star if you fix these!!
reviews.author: Shannon Smithers

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works grate wish we could go later than 1981 though
reviews.author: nate timko

reviews.title: lame
reviews.comment: Apparently there are no cars for sale within the earths diameter radius near me...fml
reviews.author: n0way07

reviews.title: Minor differences
reviews.comment: Can\'t search based on the style if vehicle like on site, makes it harder to specifically look at trucks or vans, also would be really great to not have a limit of saved cars because then I just write them down on a piece of paper which is tedious. Change those two things for 5 stars. Until then it stays 3.
reviews.author: Zac Massey

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: Great for finding vehicles!
reviews.author: Caleb Bonner

reviews.title: Unresponsive
reviews.comment: That is all.
reviews.author: Forest Marsh

reviews.comment: Wont let me open it sucks but I like the website
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Justin Benton

reviews.title: Portrait only?
reviews.comment: Portrait only is annoying.
reviews.author: JD Purvis
